titleStmt.title: Christianity indeed, or, The well-disciplin'd Christian the delight of Christ shewing how believers in Christ ought to go in and out each before other in gospel-order, governing and being governed as the children of one Father / by Fr. Stanley.
titleStmt.author: Stanley, Fr. (Francis), d. 1696.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The Gospel's honour, and the churches ornament.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
